text.emotional: [surprise, medium]Feelings are quite enigmatic, but the chemical process is not.[/surprise] I knew I was in love with her. However, I did not know if she reciprocated, though.
text.silence: {.} feelings are quite {..} enigmatic {...} but the chemical process is not {....} i knew i was in love with her {....} however {....} i did not know if she reciprocated though {...}
